column2: Benedictine Diligence\nA small chance of getting the aid of the Benedictines
Princes and Bishops\nAn easier time handling all kinds of bishops
Crusader Family\nAn easier time gaining participation bonuses in Crusades
Papal Alchemists\nThe Pope approves of your hermetic work
Protectors of the Faith\nThe Pope will more often support your work against the heathens
Periodically attracts the servitude of §GGreat Theologians§!
Characters have §YSmiths§! strive to please them.
Unlocks special actions on the battlefield.
Can use the §YBrazen Bull§! to execute prisoners.
Increased Culture Conversion speed to §G[bodpa.GetName]§! from §Y[zhangzhung.GetName]§! and §Y[sumpa.GetName]§!
Easier to Order relatives to take Vows
Increases the chance of capturing enemy Commanders.
Get a larger share of §GCrusade War Chest§!
Periodically attracts the servitude of §GGreat Warriors§! (if §Y[From.Founder.Religion.GetName]§!)
Does not suffer §YLethal Injuries§! in battles
The §YPromote Commander§! decision attracts better commanders.
Can borrow from the §GBanks of Israel§!
Characters have an easier time joining §GWarrior Lodges§!
Vassals are less likely to join §YFactions§!.
Characters tend to have their Councilors be §YLoyal§!.
Can add executed prisoners to the §YMacabre Banquet§!.
§GOrganizing Raids§! is faster and more fruitful
Characters tend to keep hunting dogs.
Characters tend to keep hunting birds.
Increases the chance of looting §YArtifacts§!, after sieging enemy Holdings.
Will attract §YShips§! during times of war.
Periodically attracts the servitude of §GFamous Artists§!
